item.description:
Colleen is emailing me more specifics about this trail. She tried it last week and mentioned
- a little waterfall from the dam to the pond
- exercise stations along the trail
- Worth the time to explore

Park by the swimming area to start the trail,which is a little bit past the booth.
There is a $4 per person State Park fee.

Bring lots of water. If the trail is short perhaps we can do another short one off the main field.
item.how_to_find_us: In the parking by the swim area, Green Volvo Wagon - EPRINT plates.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Bear Brook State Park - Catamount Trail
